title: 3.6 Shaheed Drew "History of Muslims in Australia and Advice to Earn a Livelihood"
description:
In this episode, we talk to brother Shaheed Drew about some lessons regarding the topic of earning a livelihood. We also talk about his book "40 Hadiths Relating to Islamic Finance" and the very interesting history of Muslims in Australia (and why Muslim traders came to South East Asia).


Br Shaheed also shares how some of the companions like Abu Bakr r.a. and great imams like Imam Abu Hanifa, Imam Malik and Imam Ahmad ibn Hanbal used to balance their work for Islam/ummah with earning a livelihood.


You can find Br Shaheed at:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/muslimhistoryprojects
- Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqN_vVo9ki2hJkGmk2f9RBg
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/muslim_history_projects/

Shaheed's book "40 Hadiths Relating to Islamic Finance" is available at https://iiph.com/product/40-hadiths-relating-to-islamic-finance/

Don’t forget to rate our podcast *5 stars* wherever you listen to us!
